channel.title: Straight Talk on Health and Relationships
channel.description: What does it take to survive and thrive in today's rapidly changing world? Learn practical ways to have more energy, more time, greater clarity of mind, emotional resiliency, spiritual fulfillment, and dynamic and fulfilling relationships at work and home. Join Life and Wellness Coach Denver Hudson for this inspiring, educational, and engaging podcast.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2008, INTERMAX, LLC. All rights reserved.

image.title: Straight Talk on Health and Relationships

channel.itunes:author: Coach Denver J. Hudson
channel.itunes:summary: What does it take to survive and thrive in today's rapidly changing world? Join Coach Denver Hudson for insights, practices, and personal coaching that will assist you in achieving optimal wellness, dynamic relationships and personal excellence.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Create real, sustainable change in health and relationships.

item.title: Power of Coaching - Ways to Improve Your Relationships
item.description: Learn how you can benefit from the 3 levels of coaching, plus hear specific ways you can enhance your relationships as Coach Denver Hudson is interviewed on WIBC 93.1 in Indianapolis.
item.itunes:author: Coach Denver J. Hudson
item.itunes:summary: Learn how you can benefit from the 3 levels of coaching, plus hear specific ways you can enhance your relationships as Coach Denver Hudson is interviewed on WIBC 93.1 in Indianapolis.

item.title: What Higher Gas Prices Could Mean
item.description: What could higher gas prices mean? Join Coach Denver as he explores the personal invitation behind higher gas and food prices.
item.itunes:author: Coach Denver J. Hudson
item.itunes:summary: What could higher gas prices mean? Join Coach Denver as he explores the personal invitation behind higher gas and food prices.
